issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
I wanna zoom to a high detail level,
but it is only working once per app launch.

For more details read my post,[http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/182415/timap-max-zoom-level-on-ios]

To repdorduce checkout my git example at [https://github.com/MichelBahl/ExampleIncorrectZoomBehavior]
fields.summary: ios: ti.map zoom only works the first time
